Package com.flipkart.rest

Class StudentRESTAPI

java.lang.Object
com.flipkart.rest.StudentRESTAPI
@Path("/student")
public class StudentRESTAPI
extends java.lang.Object
Class to handle all Student related API operations. Validators NotNull-checks for null values, Size checks for length of string and DecimalMin/DecimalMax checks for integer range
Author:
JEDI04

    • registerStudent

      @POST @Path("/registerStudent") @Produces("application/json") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response registerStudent​(@Pattern(message="Invalid Email Address->Valid emails:user@gmail.com or my.user@domain.com etc.",regexp="^[a-zA-Z0-9_!#$%&*+/=?`{|}~^.-]+@[a-zA-Z0-9.-]+$") @Size(min=5,max=30,message="The length of email should be between 5 to 30") @FormParam("email") java.lang.String email, @Size(min=5,max=30,message="The length of password should be between 5 to 30") @FormParam("password") java.lang.String password, @Size(min=3,max=30,message="The length of name should be between 5 to 30") @FormParam("name") java.lang.String name, @DecimalMin(value="15",message="Student shall be minimum of age 15 yr") @DecimalMax(value="30",message="Student can not have age more than 30 yr") @FormParam("age") java.lang.Integer age, @Size(min=3,max=30,message="The length of address should be between 5 to 30") @FormParam("address") java.lang.String address, @Size(min=5,max=30,message="The length of contact should be between 5 to 30") @FormParam("contact") java.lang.String contact, @Pattern(message="Please either enter male/female",regexp="^male$|^female$") @FormParam("gender") java.lang.String gender, @Size(min=3,max=30,message="The length of nationality should be between 5 to 30") @FormParam("nationality") java.lang.String nationality, @Size(min=2,max=30,message="The length of branch should be between 5 to 30") @FormParam("branch") java.lang.String branch, @NotNull @DecimalMin(value="1000",message="Roll value has to be of 4 digits") @Digits(fraction=0,integer=4) @FormParam("rollno") int rollno) throws javax.validation.ValidationException
      Method to register a new student into the system.
      Parameters:
      email - Email of the new student
      password - Password of the new student
      name - Name of the new student
      age - Age of the new student
      address - Address of the new student
      contact - Contact of the new student
      gender - Gender of the new student
      nationality - Nationality of the new student
      branch - Branch of the new student
      rollno - Roll number of the new student
      Returns:
      Response success when request serviced else bad request or something went wrong.
      Throws:
      javax.validation.ValidationException

    • updateInfo

      @PUT @Path("/updateInfo/{studentID}") @Produces("application/json") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response updateInfo​(@NotNull @DecimalMin(value="100",message="studentID value has to be of 3 digits") @Digits(fraction=0,integer=3) @PathParam("studentID") java.lang.Integer studentID, @Size(min=5,max=30,message="The length of name should be between 5 to 30") @FormParam("name") java.lang.String name, @DecimalMin(value="15",message="Student shall be minimum of age 15 yr") @DecimalMax(value="30",message="Student can not have age more than 30 yr") @FormParam("age") java.lang.Integer age, @Size(min=5,max=30,message="The length of address should be between 5 to 30") @FormParam("address") java.lang.String address, @Size(min=5,max=30,message="The length of contact should be between 5 to 30") @FormParam("contact") java.lang.String contact, @Pattern(message="Please either enter male/female",regexp="^male$|^female$") @FormParam("gender") java.lang.String gender, @Size(min=5,max=30,message="The length of nationality should be between 5 to 30") @FormParam("nationality") java.lang.String nationality) throws javax.validation.ValidationException
      Method to update details of a student.
      Parameters:
      studentID - ID of the student
      name - Name of the student
      age - Age of the student
      address - Address of the student
      contact - Contact of the student
      gender - Gender of the student
      nationality - Nationality of the student
      Returns:
      Response success when request serviced else bad request or something went wrong.
      Throws:
      javax.validation.ValidationException

    • makePayment

      @PUT @Path("/payment/{id}") @Produces("application/json") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response makePayment​(@NotNull @DecimalMin(value="100",message="studentID value has to be of 3 digits") @Digits(fraction=0,integer=3) @PathParam("id") int studentID, @Size(min=5,max=30,message="The length of method of payment should be between 5 to 30") @FormParam("method") java.lang.String method)
      Method to make payment after course registration.
      Parameters:
      studentID - ID of student
      method - Payment method chosen by student
      Returns:
      Response success when request serviced else bad request or something went wrong.
      Throws:
      javax.validation.ValidationException
